one.original:
[offset:0]
[00:-1.0]作词: mei
[00:00.-500]作曲: Henrii/mei
[00:00.00]クリームソーダとシャンデリア
[00:03.37]溶けるバニラ
[00:05.20]今隣で見惚れた
[00:07.81]不意をついて確かめたい
[00:10.95]下手な嘘で誤魔化さないでよね
[00:30.81]S.U.N.day外は晴れ
[00:33.97]なのに返信待ってだらだらin the bed
[00:38.67]用は無いから2度も送れない
[00:42.50]もうちょっと寝ておこう おっおー
[00:46.19]まだ思わせぶりな態度で未だ惑わせてるのは
[00:53.51]あなたの事もっと知りたいだけよ本当
[00:57.50]先の見えない駆け引きで....!
[01:01.24]クリームソーダとシャンデリア
[01:04.66]溶けるバニラ
[01:06.63]今隣で見惚れた
[01:09.27]不意をついて確かめたい
[01:12.34]下手な嘘で誤魔化しては
[01:16.69]クリームソーダにシャンデリア
[01:20.07]溶けるバニラ
[01:21.98]君に気づいて欲しい
[01:24.64]あからさまに目を惹いて
[01:27.73]本当の事言えたらいいのに
[01:32.38]なんかないかってきっかけより探しちゃってんのは言い訳
[01:35.89]使い慣れないセリフを並べて
[01:37.75]ドラマヒロインなんかを演じてる
[01:39.83]今日も最低で最高なBad day
[01:41.93]ばってんなんて丸に変えてく
[01:43.84]大概間違い
[01:44.87]まじ問題ない
[01:45.84]もう興味がない
[01:46.88]でも会いたい
[01:47.80]まだ話し足りないフリをしてあなた本当バカなのね
[01:55.17]私は待ってるのに
[01:58.74]どうして気づかないのよ
[02:02.73]クリームソーダとシャンデリア
[02:06.08]溶けるバニラ
[02:07.95]まだ話していたいな
[02:10.65]青い鳥を見てないで
[02:13.84]わざとらしく誤魔化しては
[02:18.22]クリームソーダとシャンデリア
[02:21.47]溶けるバニラ
[02:23.47]まだ知らないフリかよ
[02:26.08]教えて明日の予定
[02:29.15]今度こそは....!
[02:33.16]いつまでも君がいない事なんて分かってる
[02:41.12]そろそろ時間かもね
[02:44.88]月も見え出したから
[02:48.64]クリームソーダとシャンデリア
[02:52.14]好きな気持ち打ち明けるためにはさ
[02:56.77]笑う顔も隠してて
[02:59.87]あと3秒後目が合いそうだから
[03:04.20]クリームソーダとシャンデリア
[03:07.64]あなたと私は結ばれるのかな？
[03:12.23]2人同時に目が合うその時
[03:18.45]溶けたバニラ♪
one.translated:
[by:清风唔瑜]
[00:00.00]奶油苏打和霓形灯
[00:03.37]融化的香草
[00:05.20]刚才在旁边看的入迷了
[00:07.81]想出其不意地确认一下
[00:10.95]不要用拙劣的谎言蒙混过去啊
[00:30.81]S.U.Nday 外面是晴天
[00:33.97]可是在床上等着拖拖拉拉的回信
[00:38.67]因为没有理由，所以不能发第二次了
[00:42.50]再睡一会儿吧，啊哦~
[00:46.19]还是故弄玄虚的态度，让我困惑的是
[00:53.51]关于你的事，我真的只是想知道哦
[00:57.50]用看不见的未来的策略....！
[01:01.24]奶油苏打和霓形灯
[01:04.66]融化的香草
[01:06.63]刚才在旁边看到入迷了
[01:09.27]想出其不意的确认一下
[01:12.34]不要用拙劣的谎言蒙混过去啊！
[01:16.69]奶油苏打和霓形灯
[01:20.07]融化的香草
[01:21.98]希望你能注意到
[01:24.64]如此明显的吸引注意力
[01:27.73]如果能说出真心话就好了
[01:32.38]比起寻找契机 更多的是寻找借口
[01:35.89]用不习惯的台词
[01:37.75]演绎电视剧里的女主角
[01:39.83]今天是最差但也是最好的Bad day
[01:41.93]把叉号什么的变成圈
[01:43.84]大概 
[01:44.87]没错
[01:45.84]我你已经没有兴趣了
[01:46.88]但我想见你
[01:47.80]装作还没说够 你真是个笨蛋
[01:55.17]我明明在等你
[01:58.74]为什么你还没察觉到啊喂
[02:02.73]奶油苏打和霓形灯
[02:06.08]融化的香草
[02:07.95]我还没说完呐
[02:10.65]还没有看到那只青鸟
[02:13.84]故意蒙混过关
[02:18.22]奶油苏打和霓形灯
[02:21.47]融化的香草
[02:23.47]你还在装作不知道吗
[02:26.08]告诉我明天的安排
[02:29.15]这次一定要....!
[02:33.16]我知道你永远不在我身边
[02:41.12]差不多是时间了
[02:44.88]月亮也已经出现了
[02:48.64]奶油苏打和霓形灯
[02:52.14]为了倾诉喜欢的心意
[02:56.77]掩饰起忍不住的笑意
[02:59.87]再过三秒就睁开眼睛
[03:04.20]奶油苏打和霓形灯
[03:07.64]你愿意和我谈一场恋爱嘛？
[03:12.23]当彼此目光相对的一刻
[03:18.45]融化的香草
one.roman:

[00:03.37]to ke ru ba ni ra
[00:05.20]i ma to na ri de mi to re ta
[00:07.81]fu i wo tsu i te ta shi ka me ta i
[00:10.95]he ta na u so de go ma ka sa na i de yo ne
[00:30.81]S.U.N.dayso to wa ha re
[00:33.97]na no ni he n shi n ma tte da ra da ra in the bed
[00:38.67]yo u wa na i ka ra ni do mo o ku re na i
[00:42.50]mo u cho tto ne te o ko u o tsu oo
[00:46.19]ma da o mo wa se bu ri na ta i do de i ma da ma do wa se te ru no wa
[00:53.51]a na ta no ko to mo tto shi ri ta i da ke yo ho n to u
[00:57.50]sa ki no mi e na i ka ke hi ki de....!

[01:04.66]to ke ru ba ni ra
[01:06.63]i ma to na ri de mi to re ta
[01:09.27]fu i wo tsu i te ta shi ka me ta i

[01:16.69]ku rii mu soo da ni sha n de ri a
[01:20.07]to ke ru ba ni ra

[01:24.64]a ka ra sa ma ni me wo hi i te
[01:27.73]ho n to u no ko to i e ta ra i i no ni
[01:32.38]na n ka na i ka tte ki kka ke yo ri sa ga shi cha tte n no wa i i wa ke
[01:35.89]tsu ka i na re na i se ri fu wo na ra be te
[01:37.75]do ra ma hi ro i n na n ka wo e n ji te ru
[01:39.83]kyo u mo sa i te i de sa i ko u na Bad day
[01:41.93]ba tte n na n te ma ru ni ka e te ku
[01:43.84]ta i ga i ma chi ga i
[01:44.87]ma ji mo n da i na i
[01:45.84]mo u kyo u mi ga na i
[01:46.88]de mo a i ta i
[01:47.80]ma da ha na shi ta ri na i fu ri wo shi te a na ta ho n to u ba ka na no ne
[01:55.17]wa ta shi wa ma tte ru no ni
[01:58.74]do u shi te ki zu ka na i no yo
[02:02.73]ku rii mu soo da to sha n de ri a
[02:06.08]to ke ru ba ni ra
[02:07.95]ma da ha na shi te i ta i na
[02:10.65]a o i to ri wo mi te na i de
[02:13.84]wa za to ra shi ku go ma ka shi te wa
[02:18.22]ku rii mu soo da to sha n de ri a
[02:21.47]to ke ru ba ni ra
[02:23.47]ma da shi ra na i fu ri ka yo
[02:26.08]o shi e te a shi ta no yo te i
[02:29.15]ko n do ko so wa....!
[02:33.16]i tsu ma de mo ki mi ga i na i ko to na n te wa ka tte ru
[02:41.12]so ro so ro ji ka n ka mo ne
[02:44.88]tsu ki mo mi e da shi ta ka ra
[02:48.64]ku rii mu soo da to sha n de ri a
[02:52.14]su ki na ki mo chi u chi a ke ru ta me ni wa sa
[02:56.77]wa ra u ka o mo ka ku shi te te
[02:59.87]a to sa n byo u go me ga a i so u da ka ra
[03:04.20]ku rii mu soo da to sha n de ri a
[03:07.64]a na ta to wa ta shi wa mu su ba re ru no ka na?
[03:12.23]fu ta ri do u ji ni me ga a u so no to ki
[03:18.45]to ke ta ba ni ra ♪

two.original:
[offset:0]
[00:00.000]未行之路 The Road Not Taken (《原神》动画短片「未行之路」插曲) - HOYO-MiX/Aimer (エメ)
[00:00.185]作词 Lyricist：三宝 Bao / 车子玉 Ziyu Che (HOYO-MiX) / Spela Gorogranc - Shana
[00:00.299]作曲 Composer：车子玉 Ziyu Che (HOYO-MiX)
[00:00.371]编曲 Arranger：车子玉 Ziyu Che (HOYO-MiX)
[00:00.443]乐队 Orchestra：Budapest Scoring Orchestra / 龙之艺交响乐团
[00:00.526]演唱 Artist：HOYO-MiX feat.Aimer
[00:00.574]伴唱 Background Vocals：Aimer / 车子玉 Ziyu Che (HOYO-MiX)
[00:00.658]原声吉他 Acoustic Guitar：尤裴佳 Peijia You (HOYO-MiX)
[00:00.748]大提琴 Cello：陈小龙 Xiaolong Chen
[00:00.814]小提琴 Violin：朱玥 Yue Zhu
[00:00.873]录音棚 Recording Studio：Prime Sound Studio Form / Budapest Scoring / 上海广播大厦
[00:00.981]录音师 Recording Engineer：Masaki Mori (agehasprings) / Viktor Szabó / 莫家伟
[00:01.065]音频编辑 Editing Engineer：Kenji Tamai (agehasprings)
[00:01.125]混音师 Mixing Engineer：李海 Hai Li
[00:01.190]母带制作 Mastering Engineer：李海 Hai Li
[00:01.257]出品 Produced by：HOYO-MiX
[00:01.265]Traveling in the nights you've left me in.
[00:07.279]I feel you in the last blow of wind.
[00:13.297]Even nowhere I can find you out,
[00:18.150]The answer is not far off now.
[00:27.945]This journey of ours has been bittersweet.
[00:33.903]Close my eyes wondering what you would have dreamed.
[00:40.216]If you were here standing next to me,
[00:45.090]Would you know how I feel,
[00:48.404]And see what I see?
[00:57.176]Know that I'll always try.
[01:00.211]Finding your rhythm and rhyme.
[01:03.217]Though the nights are long and dark, I'll see you shining bright.
[01:09.269]And no matter where you are, you've come with me this far.
[01:15.354]Showing the way when all else falls apart.
[01:48.104]When the snow all melts away, and the ice finally breaks.
[01:54.244]Have you taken off, are you already on your way?
[02:00.931]No matter where you are, I've come with you this far.
[02:11.506]I'm never really lost.
[02:17.000]Our paths will surely cross.
two.translated:
[00:01.257]在你消失的夜里穿行
[00:07.279]微风送来最后一封信
[00:13.297]通篇找寻沉默的音讯
[00:18.150]谜底也许 不期而遇
[00:27.945]悲欢离合是旅行的考卷
[00:33.903]明月下想象另一轮明月
[00:40.216]假如某刻你我再次相见
[00:45.090]过往 能否重现
[00:48.404]故事 再向前
[00:57.176]我从未原地等待
[01:00.211]追赶命运的节拍
[01:03.217]夜幕深如海 而你照亮远方之外
[01:09.269]无论海角天涯 你找到我出发
[01:15.354]前路无阻 就算一切崩塌
[01:48.104]当白雪渐渐消融 当坚冰显现裂缝
[01:54.244]而你是否已经扬帆启航 乘着风
[02:00.931]无论海角天涯 我找到你出发
[02:11.506]我们从未迷路
[02:17.000]我们终将重逢
